Review Text: Amazing phone. Great screen image and perfect size. This phone is blazing fast and takes amazing photos! I’m so happy I upgraded from my iPhone 8 Plus!

Iphone 12 is excellent. The screen is amazing compared to my XR. The battery like is good so far. It lasts through the day. The color and new design are very good, phone is now a little easy to grip. The taking one star to for my experience with Verizon. It was nightmare getting the phone activated on Verizon network. I hope Best Buy soon starts selling unlocked IPhone.

The upgrades that are a part of the iPhone 12 are meaningful. 5G allows for greater cellular speed and in some cases is faster than WiFi, especially public WiFi. I’m not a fan of the home button going away, but that can’t be changed and is old news.
My husband was very impressed with the new I-phone!

The iPhone 12 5G was more than my mom could ask for. She does everything on her phone (no computer), and was stuck on Android for a bit due to her 6yr old iPhone finally dying. She was thrilled to be back on a familiar platform, and I enjoyed the chance to tinker around with it a few days. Glad Apple FINALLY decided to get on the 5G bandwagon. Now I need to consider whether or not I'll be switching from Android at the next cycle.
Really like the iPhone 12. Would have given a 5star, but the didn’t have the color phones we wanted. Sales person helping us was excellent!
The products arrived on time and work as described.
Got this for my son and he loves it! The new camera is awesome!

I bought my iPhone 12 128gb in blue about 3 weeks ago, and so far it's the best phone I've ever owned! I love this phone and I chose this over the pro because of it's superior battery life, the pro often gets about 10 mins less than this phone because the phone uses more ram. The pro model only has a camera and ram upgrade but this has the same oled screen (excluding 800 nits, the normal gets 625 which is plenty given higher nits causes more energy consumption) fast charging is insanely fast with about 50% in 28 mins - half an hour usually for me, the battery life is a GIANT jump over my 7 (which needed a new battery) I got about 2 hours on the 7 and I now get about 8 hours on this which is a full day for me. I have gotten 157mbps on low band 5g (which is very fast of course for long distance over the air communication) The only bad thing about this phone is that 5g does drain the battery life slightly, but it's not as much as the reviewers complain about.
All and more then I expected and a Learning project to boot.

So my daughter had the phone for about a week and a half and a new update happened. It completely froze her phone. Couldn’t even power it off. Took care of the issue after several attempts. No problems since. Fingers crossed.
This is a great upgrade from my iPhone 6s. The iPhone 12 has good battery life and clever new features. Screen clarity is fabulous. A+.
Great phone. Love the larger screen and the many additional things that will do
Great phone fast sleek and overall the BESTEST great gift
Great phone with awesome features. The camera is impressive.
Can’t get all my emails phone is very small sorry I purchased it don’t recommend it
Awesome phone. Great battery life and good build quality

Love the performance. I’m very pleased with how fast it will charges...once I purchased the necessary a equipment. For the amount I paid for the phone, I shouldn’t have had to buy a charger to reap the new phone’s capability. Bought an AUKEY Focus 60W PD Charger,USB C Wall Charger with Dynamic Detect & PD 3.0 [GaN Tech] Fast USB C Charger
Love our new phone! Faster and better thank the 10. A lot more clearer!
love the camera - takes nicer photo's than the iphone 7. Emergency call button engaged a few times in error, but was able to cancel quickly
bought this phone for my daughter, always satisfied with apple products
Camera on phone is great. Phone is easy to use and I've been a lifelong Samsung user
It's my sons phone..I have an android...he likes it

I don’t like Best Buy at all. I bought a phone from Best But because my son wanted to go there. On December 26 . The phone your associate brought out didn’t even work. Then he said he had to order it. I paid for the activation fee. So when he had to pick up the phone on January 6 . All’s he would have to do. Is pick it up. But they tell him. My payment had to be refunded. And they made him pay the. 50.26 cents. Totally unprofessional. This is the third time. I have had issues with your company. I’m at the point now. I will Steer people away from your company. And tell the to go elsewhere.
Absolutely love my new iPhone. I’m so glad they brought the square bodies back. I don’t see much difference in the other features.
It's just like all the others, except this one has a nicer camera.
Got this for my son for early Christmas present, and he loves it. Options on it are great.

Very Happy with my IPhone 12. Hadn't purchased a new phone in several years.
 
 Donna
This phone is virtually the same as the iPhone 11 except for the 5G coverage.
Beautiful pictures, easy to use and faster processor.

This is my first IPhone. Have always been a android guy. A bit of a learning curve but I am really liking my new phone. Think I should have switched a long time ago. Battery last a long time, love the face recognition nad it seems faster than my last android.
Good phone. Gets real warm when charging. Would recommend to a friend as a lower cost iPhone. Picture quality is great.
It’s honestly the same as the older versions. The speed is faster. Don’t have stable 5g to understand the quickness of 5g yet. The camera is slightly better. Not that much noticeable. Apple is Apple
for the price cant beat it love the color to 5g is the best
Can never go wrong with iPhone , great screen, very fast. Great upgrade

Other than not having headphone jack, I haven’t found anything I did not like about this phone yet. The way some things in it function are definitely an adjustment and that has made both Google search and YouTube my new best friends. The photos are amazing and I love how it doesn’t let calls or notifications come through while I’m resting. Thanks to that I can FINALLY get a good night’s sleep. If you have a non-Bluetooth car, like me, you’ll definitely need to buy a dual audio splitter in order to run the phone through your car’s audio system. Either that or use Bluetooth headphones. But overall I love this phone!
Great design and features. Apple does it again. Camera is fantastic especially after coming from the 7.
Amazing iPhone - super fast and as expected no issues upgrading from an iPhone 7
Froze up 6 times in 5 days. Returned it it got, got the Note 20 Ultra instead Same price. Should've kept the Iphone 8+.
Went from iPhone 7 to the iPhone 12. Absolutely love it. Right size, beautiful screen. Took some pics at night and the camera is terrific. Highly recommend.
Loving it so far. Cameras great. Haven’t had any issues with it at all

I just bought a iPhone 12 in Best Buy and the quality was excelente, this is the second iPhone I buy with them. I use to go to apple store but the line are huge and here is fast in just min I got to pick the phone and they help me right away. Plus the screen protector is warranty for life. I love it !!!
Great phone, great Best Buy service. Been buying my phones there for over fifteen years.
Wife really loves this...fast and charges quickly and its a really nice color
The iPhone 12 is lightweight and easy to use. It has many features that I haven't even started to explore.

Great size. Not too small and not too large, in my opinion. So far, I have not experienced any glitches. Great battery life, this is the key thing I notice about this phone. I also like the Box shape of the phone, it makes it easy to hold on to.
Pretty nice iPhone. Lots of capacity. Easy to use.
Beautiful design, Apple are the best phone so far according to my knowledge, I love it very much
This is an upgrade from my 7 plus and very happy with it. A little smaller in size but big on features!
GREAT PHONE LOVE IT A LOT BETTER FOR MY BUSINESS AND A CAMERA
Nice IPhone 12! Love the red color that Apple made. Size is just right and love all the speed that it has.
Great product! Definitely an upgrade from my last phone! 10/10
The red is stunning in person! Love the phone, gets me through the day on one charge and camera takes great pictures.
As of today 12/11/2020, I still not get this phone yet. I bought this on 11/28/2020.
I love my new phone. Very fast response times. Great camera!
My first Apple product I’ve always had androids but I do like it a lot it’s easy to use

I have been a long time user of Android devices, but this purchase has been well worth the switch. Though it took a little getting used to, this phone is great and the operating system is very fast and user friendly. I highly recommend the 12, whether it be for work or pleasure.

Love my new phone. It’s an upgrade from the iPhone 6S so the difference is astounding. The camera is wonderful. Initially I was annoyed about having to purchase the air pods but I must say they are life changing. Last but not least the service at the Watertown, MA store is always great. Caleb got me completely set up and walked me through the whole process. He was fantastic. This is why I shop at Best Buy. The customer service can’t be beat.
Phone for my wife and she loves it. Upgraded from the iPhone7
Needed to replace my old iPhone. Once again, the upgrade did not disappoint and Apple's iPhone does it all.
I am really enjoying this phone. Must quicker and easier to use than my previous phone
A great telephone for people like me who want to be locked into a monopolistic eco-system where everything is overpriced and special purpose.
Beautiful design, love the nod to the classic iPhone 5. Super fast, works great.

We’ve been an iPhone family for as long as I can remember. It’s got great features and and is very user friendly. I’m loving the color too! We got this during their Black Friday sale and the deal was great!
If you have ever had an iPhone then you know it is easy to use. The camera is of great quality and takes incredible pictures. Almost the the quality of a expensive camera.
Got it for my wife and she loves it. Good feel to it and the screen is bigger.
I had the iPhone 8s+ prior to this phone. It’s a world of difference! Better screen, faster speed, better pictures, but it still has the big screen and ease of use that I expect from my iPhone.
The Iphone 12 is amazing. So easy to use and the size is perfect. So far I have not had any issues and all of my prior data was transferred onto it with no problems.

Excellent phone, awesome camera, easy to set up from your old Iphone... 
 Fast and reliable. I personally love the magnetic charge feature and face recognition.

Coming from a 6s, this is a welcome upgrade. Take a little getting used to no longer having a home button, but that disappears immediately. 
 Bright clear screen and fast to respond to apps and commands. 
 Looking forward to the speeds 5G will bring.
Great Camera. The phone is more of a Coral than “ProductRed” . So if you’re accustom to the “PR” it won’t be the same at all.

The I Phone 12 is a great upgrade to my older 6S Plus. Although it has a smaller screen it is easier to use. Fits in my pocket better than the over sized 6S plus. The screen is pretty user friendly. Navigating through the applications is pretty intuitive and the 5G makes the response time and use much easier.
Lightweight and a good size with all the features of the pro. Screen is vibrant and large.

It's a nice size and it's faster than my 7. I really can't see any major advantages with 5G, but I don't game on the phone. Doesn't come with earbuds or a charger, but it does include a newly designed charging cable. Apple apparently doesn't have enough money and wants to sell us a new charger and earbuds. They claim it's "more environmentally friendly." Uh-huh.
I hope this phone last better than that iPhone 11 that only last 14 months cost me $220 to repair by the geek squad and then I found out I only get $220 exchange

Store review , phone fine. Unless you have 2-3 hours don’t buy at Best Buy, line outside 30 minutes to be told to go inside. 15 minutes inside told it would be an hour. Came back 2 hours later wait was an hour unless they lost your phone. So an hour later they find, then an hour more to just sign contract. No setup, I wanted to go home, it’s pretty simple. Phone works fine, would have to seriously think about buying here again. My time not important they were all paid to let me wait, no I am sorry, it was our fault.
Camera features on the phone are really great and still learning everything else. But the overall phone has changed and got better.
Fiancé loves it, I got the blue color. Best design, love that rectangular shape vs the rounded edges
Best iPhone yet. Great battery life and a fantastic camera!
Absolutely love my new phone. Upgraded from the 7+ So it’s wonderful!
Excited to see how this new iPhone 12 works. I love the retro look.
Purchased for my child. Love iPhone products and highly recommend it.
iPhone 12, 5G is excellent. It is fast and advanced. The phone size is perfect,too.
Apple iPhone 12 is a great product whole family got upgrades, they are amazing.
This was the phone for the wife. She’s technologically challenged, but seems to like it. She upgraded from an iPhone 5s, so BIG change.

The leap from my iPhone 8 to iPhone 12 is like taking a giant leap on the moon for mankind! The increased speed, greater memory, larger storage, improved pics, video, and sound have been a life changer. It's like having a laptop and phone that can fit in my back pocket.
excellent phone. awesome camera. especially good in low light.
Great resolution, speed and connectivity. I love the magnetic back for wireless charging and the wallet attachments!
As always, no complains on any of apple products. Camera is excellent.
The phone works great. iPhone never disappoints. It simply just works.

I love my new phone. Apple delivers again! The camera is quite an upgrade from the 8.
Still getting used to the 12, a definitive upgrade from my 8. The camera is amazing and the phone is so easy to use.
It took a bit to get used to, I’ve only had androids. I initially had trouble with my Apple ID

So frustrated - some software glitch is dropping the volume of my calls, alerts, everything. See others having the same problem. (I tried the fixes others have recommend (connected to the facial recognition- REALLY?!) 
 iPhone is iPhone - nothing that seems so different than my 6s - but the battery is not dropping like a rock but this dropping the volume on my apps and most importantly my alarms and calls is terrible!!!
Excellent product. Quick transfer and install from old to new.
This was an upgrade from iPhone 8. Much better camera and faster processor.
Big upgrade from iPhone 7. Sleek design and camera quality is best to date of iPhones.

Best iPhone so far. 
 Photos are good.

Love this phone easy to operate takes excellent photos
iPhone 12. I love this new phone. Bette than my old 7 plus.

Nicely done Apple. The new iPhone is an attractive package with a nice display. It seems smaller but the screen is a good size with no “waste “around the edges of the display.

Enjoying new phone. Increased speed to bring sites up nice. Everything in old calendar didn’t transfer. Have had two instances when someone called and could not hear me answer. Sleep button hard to press at times.

Nice cell phone. Nice battery life. Only problem, the sound is tinny when I play music. (which I love to do). What should I do about that? doesn't do that when I have my headphones on, but I don't go around with my headphones on.

The 6.1" screen is just the right size, not too small, not to big. There is a noticed positive difference in the speed.
Faster, stays charged longer great upgrade from iPhone x, love the color
Great price and easy to use, transfer from the old phone went well.
I love the color and function of my phone. I missed having an Apple phone.

Apple makes quality products and I have owned their computers since the 80's. The products perform well and the navigation is intuitive. Unfortunately, once you "buy" into their world, they make sure you stay in it. With my previous phone, an Android, you could change the battery--not with Apple phones. You need to buy a new phone. And their connectors are proprietary....with nice marketable names of course. Would I recommend this phone? Yes, but with the understanding that you should know that you have now joined the exclusive and expensive Apple world.
Can never go wrong with an IPhone, upgraded from iPhone X, the trade in was nice made it so worth it.
Easy upgrade if you are already and iPhone user. Love this color

Very happy with the item and Best Buy I have been trying to get a new phone for a while now and it seemed impossible but once going on Best Buy’s website I was instantly approved through Verizon and got my new phone and service that very same day

Well pleased! I had the 8 which finally had to be replaced.

Got this for my wife and she loves it! She really likes the blue color.
I love the iPhone 12. I had the iPhone 7 before this and the updated camera is amazing. I would recommend getting.

But some of the defaults of new iOS are a bit puzzling/annoying, for example the phone does a loud ring once then soft rings thereafter (shouldn't it just ring at the same loudness level??). Excellent battery life. Very limited 5G in my area, so it drops in and out. But when 5G works, it really works (about 800mbps download speed). A bit expensive, but we know that.

Apple iPhones are a staple in my household. We purchase due to user friendly technology and compatibility with other Apple products. Early holiday gift for my son. Alternate years for gifts with other family members. Easy shopping. Helpful staff also copied items over for us for while we shopped.

This purchase was made for our daughter. She loves it.

After six months of use, I'm happy with the 12 overall. Battery life drains after a full day of heavy use, but I rarely need to charge between morning and bedtime. Purchasing from BestBuy was easy. They quickly performed all the work necessary to activate my new phone and deactivate the old one. Customer service experience was on par with the Apple Store.

So far I’m very impressed with this phone. The 5 G downloads pictures from the job site faster than the xfinity wi fi at home. 
  The case is sold and NOT glass like the 11 which shattered on mine

This phone is future proofed. The XII is stronger and better at not breaking when dropped than previous iPhones. It has 5G cellular capability (when it gets built out). The cameras are amazing for a phone! The chip is very fast and the battery life is good so far.
Associate was very friendly and took care of our needs.
Great phone, great price, love Apple, great color...

I really like this phone it was a big upgrade from my 7. 
 It’s cheaper in the long run to buy it out right, I don’t feel it was that expensive compared to some others. 
 Love the Face ID, it’s easy to use and it takes great pictures. I love it
Excellent product, great customer service, and product protection.
Got this phone on a $400 trade in deal for my Iphone XR. Great deal and excellent phone.
Good battery easy to use wish I would of got the one with 3 cameras but I was excited for a upgrade smh
I love my phone. It’s fast and takes awesome pics. It’s very light weight. I upgraded from a X and glad I did !! I want think my husband should upgrade now as well !!
This purchase was made for our son. He said he loves it.
My first iPhone. Had Samsung galaxy but wanted the Apple Watch. This phone is super efficient and way faster than the 64 g I had

Bad experience
 After waiting 20-30 mts in line, I was told to cancel my best buy order since they could not activate it. 
 Would not recommend best buy any more

Upgraded from iPhone 8 to IPhone 12 so I had lots to get used to. iCloud back up was easy and successful. Quick responses and battery is lasting almost two days. Screen is very easy to read indoors or out. Once i got familiar with no home button I am very happy with access and over apps.
Great phone, easy setup, good service. Answers nicely and no troubles so far.
Very nice phone it’s easy to use very durable and Would recommend to anyone
iPhone is everything I look for in a cell phone. Salesman was very competent in transferring info from my old phone.
This is a great phone. The camera takes beautiful pictures. You need to take the time to learn all the new enhancements.
If your looking for a smaller handheld phone, this is the one. Easy to use, Apple incredible device, photos are sharper, all around a great phone
The item is fine , the process To get the item from you guys was terrible.

very happy with the look.the fact that the screen glass doesn't have the curve that the previous generations had makes it much easier to apply a full screen protector. overall the quality is great as with all apple products). HOWEVER to me this is just another iphone11 with a very slightly better processor and 5G capability.as far as battery life and quality goes it shall be determined in time.
Great phone, lighter weight than the XR nice screen too
I bought this for my grandaughter. It goes all day. She is always texting and taking photos. It is very fast, has great storage and bettery last a long time. A++

My iPhone works extremely well. Many thanks to the salesman at BestBuy where I bought the iPhone. I'm always finding new things to do on it. I tell everyone about the products I bought and the wonderful service I received.
Clearest display ever! Best Phone speeds, I only have to charge it once every 2 days. I could make 3 if I tried. The camera is incredible too.
Not very different from the previous version. Did not feel the difference between 4G and 5G.

The phone itself - great. However, the phone was not working well with 5G and could not make or receive phone calls after I left the store. After many trips between Best Buy and Verizon I spent about 5 hours of my time in a 24 hour period trying to correct problem. I had to have the SIM card replaced. Verizon and Verizon rep at Best Buy need to get on the same page re: using device dollars. Best Buy says you can’t, but verizon says you can if you call them at point of purchase. Communicate.
12 is too small should of purchased the 12Max but due to restock fee couldn’t afford to return. So stuck with it.

This was a jump from my iPhone 6plus as I had been putting off a purchase for several years. But I am so happy I got this phone. I can’t believe the ease of use this is. Meryim at Best Buy was great. She setup my phone and transferred everything from my old phone. The phone was all set up for me. I definitely recommend this phone.
great color and performance compare to the iphone 10 XR
Best IPhone yet. Nice size. I don’t really have true 5G but I always buy for the future. Love the Face ID. It takes great pictures. Processor is the same as the pro version.
Big improvement from earlier model 7. Easy to setup and get access to all familiar apps.
Facial feature is nice, same size as previous I phone 7 with a larger screen.

We upgraded from the iPhone 8 - no regrets! And it wasn’t as difficult as I had thought, having no home button! Very happy with our purchases! 
 Also, the team at Best Buy in Cumming, GA was great!
I love my new phone works great and very easy to use!
iPhone 12, so far so good! Had iPhone 6 Plus that couldn’t be fixed, just died, wouldn’t charge or come on! iPhones don’t last like they used too!!
I like the new iPhone 12 a lot. The thickness is better than previous models. I thought I would miss the HOME button, but am okay without it. Would recommend this phone to friends.
Typically excellent Apple product. Works as advertised.
Love my new iphone 12. Was a bit tough to get used to not having a home button, but I'm used to it now. Love the battery life!
The product did not come with a manual which would have helped with its initial use. The IPhone 6 was easier to handle as well.
It didn't take me long to learn the new features of the iPhone 12 from my iPhone 6s. I like the bigger screen and clearer and sharper images on the display. You can't go wrong with an apple product.

Apple - iPhone 12 5G 128GB - Blue (Sprint) Has seem to be easy enough to get used to I’ve had quite a few dropped calls but I’ve had the same problem with my last phone living in a remote area doesn’t help. Maybe I need to choose a different carrier
Had the X, this camera is a lot better! The rest seems about the same per my daughter. My wife wants one now the last few have lasted 2 years before crapping our. So I expect the same from this one
better than previous models however as always apple products are over priced but got to follow the trend lol
Truly a bang for the buck phone, the value you get from this is the biggest value in years.

I love my new phone. The screen seems much larger then past Iphones even though the actual phone size is the same as my old iPhone 6s. I really like the camera. It adjusts with the lighting in any environment and takes a quality photo with little effort.

The iPhone 12 is lighter and smaller. I like the new blue color choice, but the aluminum rails scratch easily. The Best Buy trade-in program is great since you are credited the full amount at time of purchase. Overall this is a good choice.
I love the new design it is very easy to handle and best of all you don’t loose any screen size
Great phone. Works great and love the new design. The battery seems to drain quickly and doesn’t last the entire day, however.
Love the phone. Size is perfect. takes really good pictures.
Love the Apple phone so was no brained to get this one when it was time for any upgrade. Love the red color. This one replaced an iPhone 6S plus.

Love, Love , Love my iPhone 12 I originally wanted and iPhone 12 Pro, but Best Buy was out, so won’t for just the 12, but I previously had the iPhone 8 Plus . Love the Face ID , I love how everything transferred over from the 8 to the 12. Everything is faster now , lobe the camera! Thought I was gonna have to take some
 Learning not to use the home
 Button, but I already am use to not having the home button. It fits in my hand much better and the the screen is the same size as the iPhone 8 Plus’ Here is to another 4 years before I buy a new phone !
Another solid Apple product. It's a good phone. Hi.
Works very well and love all the new features on Apple 12

Awesome phone! 
 I loved my android but every one else had I phones and now we can all face time
Awesome folks there at the Columbia store always a pleasure thank you again
Nice and small like my old one Iphone s6. Easy to setup as long as you have already done a back up of the information before hand.
Awesome phone! The camera is amazing and the speed is out of this world. I would recommend the 12 to family and friends.
This is a great product, would recommend to anyone.
Love the square body and how light it is. The 5g is more fast also
Not sure about the iPhone 12 yet. It is taking some getting used to. P
My son loves it, just what he needed for college!!
Awesome phone and easy to use and I would Highly recommend the latest IPhone
Yes, it does have a better camera and battery than previous models but there is no wow factor. If your phone is functional, do not upgrade. You will have buyers remorse.
Very poor of apple to charge this amount for a phone and no charger of EarPods.

I was a bit taken back how different it was to work than my iphone8,
 so I went to Verison and had 3 questions. Had to wait, the guy there answered my question quickly so I left, but walked back to the door of Verison as I forgot to ask about my bluetooth. But the female at the door would not let me go back in to ask another question. She said noo you cannot come back in we are too busy so I will forever be upset with Verison for treating a long time Verizon customer as such. Not happy at all. She was mean and rude.

I’ve used iPhones since 2013 and haven’t looked back. I like the new design (I guess kind of an old design like the iPhone 5 & 6) but I feel like this one fits better in the hand and is easier to secure in the hand. Battery life is better than my XR, and the speed is sizzling fast. Plus I really enjoy the blue color of this phone. Definitely recommend.
Absolutely love it? Upgraded from the xs max, got a grade trade in offer while getting a new phone. Love the old shape! Great buy
Got this for my husband as an upgrade for our anniversary since we could travel as we are use to doing. He loves it. He is getting well acquainted with it especially at night. Great upgrade.

Only had for a month or so...but very easy to use. Got the 128 gig upgrade versus the standard 64 gig for future storage capability. 
 Traded in old I-phone 7 and immediately noticed longer battery life. 
 No experience yet with faster speeds with 5G...which is why
  it's a 4 versus a 5
Been a while since I bought a new iPhone but I love. Not real tech savvy but this phone works for me.

Purchased an iPhone for a gift. I was told that I could activate it at home, but I came to find out that the phone was active, and the phone that it was replacing was no longer active. Employee was fast and courteous, especially on Christmas Eve.
I bought this phone for my daughter and she is very happy with her iPhone 12.
Excellent service, 5 stars, patient, knowledge able and friendly
My son loves this phone for its vibrant display, great sound and the mint green color is just a bonus to such a great phone.

Good battery life and the Face ID is a lot better than I thought it would be. I didn't wear a mask to set up a Face ID, and I don't know if that works or not. Set up a passcode just in case and you should be home free. Fast and a great product.

The iPhone 12 and all of the accessories are working very well. The charger works very quickly to charge up the phone in record time. The car charger is also very quick and efficient. The iPhone 12 is all it's said to be--fast, 5G and very nice to use. I would recommend all highly. I love Apple products and these are great!
Love it...easy to use...great camera love the color
I love my new iPhone. Very user friendly and takes great pictures. Wish it still came with the charger though.
Great product, I am pleased with it. However there is one drawback the brick is not included.
I switched from a Samsung Galaxy S10 to my new iPhone and realized I waited far too long to make the switch. I am enjoying my new phone immensely.
Gave it to my daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves it.
Love this phone. I really thought I would get a larger one after having a Samsung Note 8.. But this is an exceptional piece of equipment and sized perfectly.

I love the phone. The camera's great. I like the size - not too big and not too little. The screen is good. I do Zumba via Zoom on it and I have no problem seeing it and participating like I did on my old phone. I like the face recognition lock/sign-in. And the color's really nice, although you don't really see it with the case on it (except on the back where the camera hole is). It charges fine, but be aware that it comes with a chord but no block. It doesn't work with the old blocks. There's a fast charging block from Apple that works well. We got one from Verizon that works really well too. Both of them charge significantly faster than the old ones did. It's not cheap. We got the extra storage. (It's $50 more to go from 64GB to 128GB, which is well worth it. Costs another $100 to go to 256GB so we decided not to.)

For some reason Samsung went with what they call a ''C'' connector for the charging port and the 2 phones I had with them was nothing but a hassle. Apple connector is a male and the port is a female connection. And it stays tight where the Samsung phones female to the port which is male. The problem is the male end wears out after awhile and the you lose the connection to where will not not charge anymore and its replacement time.I haven't had any issue with the iphone 12 as of yet. very easy purchase process and item arrived earlier than expected

Don’t let the size fool you into thinking this phone is not a mini monster does everything you have to camera are great video is awesome a lot of people want to say the battery is bad and have not even used the phone I get anywhere from 6 to 7 hrs of screen time on this bad boy and that’s plenty for me if your looking for a phone to give you more then 7hr of screen time this is not for you other then that battery is not bad

Perfect size!! iphone 13, 14, 15,.....etc, should all come in this size!

I am a long time iPhone user starting with the 3, 4S, 5C (green) and 8S. I have wished for a smaller phone since the 4S was the perfect size to hold etc. The 5SE was too small as were the small iPhones recently. FINALLY they brought back a smaller format but the screen is all visible and I love the square design which is like the 4S.........This phone is amazingly fast, comfortable to hold and I was worried I would miss the home button, I don't. Within 30 seconds I was used to the swipe screen. I have never had Face ID and I love it. So far no 4K pics or videos but can't wait for them. I have a clear Tech21 case which I have also had for my past iPhones. Protects the 12 well. Highly recommend this. I also went for 128GB which I have never been able to do in the past. LOVE IT!!!!!!!!

I would have given 5 stars except that they didn’t tell me that I needed to upgrade our service. As a result, I had poor service with the new phone. I went back in to Best Buy, I waited an hour before someone could tell me that the phone was fine-the problem was with the AT&T service.
Love the phone, it is perfect size with good performance.
Haven't come across any issues to date but it's only a few days old
I’m a reformed android user. This phone is amazing. It’s super fast, easy to use, and fits perfectly for one hand use. So glad I switched.

Last phone was an old SE, this is almost the exact same size. Everything about this is better. Great camera, faster, and gets a bit better reception. One drawback, probably minor for most, is that the speakers on the phone don’t sound as good when playing music through them. Bit surprising as the voice quality for calls is much better. Overall, really like it, the small size is very important for me.
Like the size. People are telling me that my voice is breaking up on the phone. I have changed the contrast on the screen but it is still not sharp enough. Maybe I need to call the Geek Squad?

This phone is just adorable. I bought the Pro Max and the Mini on the same day because I just couldn’t decide between the two. I did end up choosing to keep the 12 Pro Max, but I really did enjoy the mini. I like it more than the regular 12.
Easy to use. Screen display is great and love the larger image on the screen size. Love the size of this phone.
Great phone, only downside is battery life. I hardly notice the size change other than that from my switch of owning a larger phone. Love the smaller size, easier to fit in my pocket.

Great phone! Just left the Samsung camp for this. Much better battery life for its size. Low heat dispersion vs my old phone. Best thing is I no longer get jabbed or have to struggle to fit it in my pockets. With the 5g every thing is faster and the gps is more accurate . Added bonus is my expensive wireless Samsung chargers work with this phone .

Good size and clarity camera is clear and good resolution memory
  is larger then past equipment used
Love this small phone. Easy to handle and store in jean pocket!

I absolutely love this phone. I features are great. I like smaller phones so this phone is perfect. The only downside that I found, I have an older car and need to use an auxiliary cord for Pandora and taking calls. I found a particular work around but I cannot charge, listen to Pandora and take calls. In order to take a call, I have to use the speaker phone option on the phone, cannot use the car speakers.

I purchased this phone thinking that downsizing from my 7plus would be good. Wrong! It’s similar to an iPhone 5 in size and very small after using a big phone. It’s like Apple went from xxl to xs in phone sizes. I’d prefer a nice medium please. 
  Also, all 3 of my iPhones have been red. This phone is NOT red. When held side by side with an 11 or my 7 plus, it looks more like a vibrant orange. 
  If you want a much smaller phone in orange then this is for you. I returned the 12 for an 11.

This is a prime example of technology that makes life easy, but not better. Tech so advanced that it's incapable of working with older stuff or lasting much longer than the warranty. It has a lot of bells and whistles but you don't need them so it isn't really better, but it was really easy for Apple to take my money. They got rid of the audio jack requiring a purchase of an adapter. They didn't include a charger base requiring me to buy a new one that matched the phone. They even changed the size so that I'd have to get a new case. Good thing Best Buy offers payment plans and I have an awesome credit score. If you just want to text, call, and check emails then you can totally go cheaper.

Great iPhone advance.

The size of this item is not the same to what I expected. I really want to return cuz I don’t like it.
Was pleased when first purchased but soon realized the weak battery.

So handy and nice

I was going to order straight from Sprint on. Thursday night, but they charged $10 shipping and the package wouldn’t until Monday at the earliest. My old phone had broken, so I was in a bit of a time crunch. I was sad when my local Best Buy didn’t have the color I wanted in stock, but they offered free shipping and an estimated delivery of that Saturday. I was skeptical that it would arrive on time, but it did! I had my new phone all set up and ready to go Saturday afternoon and I have been in love with it ever since! Great battery life, great camera, all-around happy with my upgrade.
I love the small but not too small feel of this phone. It is great for ppl who have an iPad already.

I got this for my fiancee who is a big Apple fan. I, myself is more of an android fan, but if you like Apple phones better than this is the one for you. She had an Apple 7 and wanted a new phone but wanted something not overly big. This model checks all the marks. Excellent phone that will last several years because it is 5g compatible.

When I first set the phone up, all calls that I were receiving were going straight to voice mail. The phone was set to "Do not disturb" from 12 am until 12 AM and I did not realize it. In other words all calls. I don't know if this was Apple's, Best Buy's or Verizon's fault. It took me a while to realize why I was not getting any calls. When I figured it out, I fixed the setting and I now love the phone. Also, the phone is pretty expensive.
This was the fastest easiest phone purchase ever. Great experience.
Bought 2 iphone 12 mini’s. One for me and one for my adult daughter for Christmas.
It’s a good small phone. Works fine. Upgraded from an iPhone 6 and had no issue. Like the facial recognition feature.
Lightweight, compact, and full of features. This is a perfect size phone that still keeps up with the latest technology.

Same great quality and experience I've come to expect from Apple. Worked great right out of the box. As an IT person, I would say that if you're not used to doing initial set-up yourself (installing SIM, activating service, etc) then you may be better off purchasing directly from a store (got this one delivered) so they do it for you. It's not hard, but there are no instructions. I just know that most of my users would be befuddled if they received it as it came.
This phone is a nice size with great oled display and easy to use.
small in size but acts and works as good as bigger phones. Fast, reliable and easy to handle

I've been an Android user for years and finally decided to make the leap to Apple with the introduction of the iPhone 12 Mini. I've been waiting for someone to go back to the small phone factor and couldn't be more happy with my purchase. Everything just seems to run better on this device and it fits into my pocket again. I get about 2 days on a single charge which is well above what everyone's been reporting online, although mostly use my phone for phone calls and text messages. I've ordered some of the magsafe attachments and can't wait to try those out. I would highly recommend the iPhone 12 Mini for anyone looking for a new cell phone.

I initially wanted to return it because I didn’t think the phone would be this small - I went from owning an iPhone 7 Plus, to this 12 Mini, so it was a noticeable difference. But I’ve had this phone for over a month now, and I’ve grown to love the size...my hands aren’t as tired from holding and using the phone, and it fits better in my leggings pockets when I go out for a run. So, I’ll live with it.
Love the size of the mini - had always had the max and this size is great.

I love my new phone. The size is perfect. 
  The one thing I really don’t like , there is no home button. It’s taking sometime to get use to it. The camera is wonderful. Takes great low light pictures.

Love the 12 mini
  Upgrade from 7
  Better battery life and smooth transition in transferring previous phone content

Super happy with this purchase and my first iPhone since the 4s. I hope Apple will continue to offer this smaller model; the size is perfect for my hands and pants pockets. Bending over is no longer painful! 
  
  Love the look and very impressed by the cameras once I played with things a little. I’m coming from a Pixel 3 which still takes excellent photos, especially in lower light. But in outdoor lighting the iPhone 12 is definitely an improvement. And video? Night and day. Not even close. I can’t believe how great the footage is that I’m getting on such a small phone. 
  
  The only negative I’ve seen about this phone in reviews - and the only thing that made me hesitant - was the battery size. Honestly, it hasn’t been an issue at all and routinely lasts longer than my Pixel 3 did. I can absolutely get 2 days out of a single charge, no problem. If you’re someone who uses your phone all day long then yeah, a bigger battery will serve you better. But seriously. It’s totally fine for most people. Do not be scared. 
  
  Haven’t tried any MagSafe accessories yet, as it’s not a huge incentive for me and I will say that it’s high time Apple move to USB-C already. Maybe next year... But in the meantime I just use wireless charging mostly and it works great. Very happy with the speed. 
  
  All in all, it was an easy transition and not one I regret. The price is great and you can get more storage with the money you save compared to some of its bigger siblings.
Don’t understand it but my kids forced me into it.. very hard for a senior to maneuver around transfer SUCKED lost ALL contacts & pictures. Very disappointing..

I’ve always been an Android person, but this tiny machine has me 50/50 now. It’s so cute, the size is perfect for my small hands, it works absolutely perfect, and the cameras are amazing! I do use my phone quite a lot through the day for work, and usually the battery lasts me until the end, but I recently got a portable charger for those longer days lol
Great phone so far still new to me getting the adjustment from my upgrade. No complaints so far at all.

I am happy with the size of this phone. I didn't want something bigger because I don't have big hands. However the display on the screen uses the whole phone so going to a smaller phone actually gave me a bigger display. Happy.
The iPhone 12 mini resembles the iPhone 5 but larger. The features on this is better than I expected. I’ve had it for a couple of weeks and I’m still finding new things.

So far best iPhone I have had in years the mini is the perfect size to better fit in your hands on the go. With the touch screen it really uses all the size to feel like a larger phone when viewing videos or FaceTime.
I love iPhones! Wouldn’t go with anything else. I really like the smaller size. It fits in my hand and pocket better than my old 6S.
the phone is very nice. I like all the features but having to set up myself was very hard to do

the only small problem i have with fat fingers is i push the wrong keys sometimes.but fits perfect in my pocket

good phone. Would recommend to a friend. Small and easy to use.
Love the size (iPhone 12 Mini) and hey it’s an Apple!
My husband loves this new phone. The camera is great and the speed is awesome. The price is a bit high, but that’s Apple! It has plenty of storage space and features.

It’s like the original iPhone SE but more functional: very fast response and app performance, screen size is small but uses almost the entire front face, able to use one hand to type/Swype. Aesthetically similar to original iPhone SE but slightly bigger and much larger usable screen area. Camera has 1x and 0.5x lenses but no telephoto. Battery lasts for entire workday with heavy use (workplace messaging apps and safari).

Apple makes very good, reliable products, and they last long, with proof from my last I-Phone 6. It takes a while to get used to all of the functions of this new phone , but eventually you'll get used to it! 
  Technology is very challenging for people my age , but if we want to co-exist with the current trends ,it's obvious we are going to have to learn all the protocols that go with these new products. The same goes for the Smart TV I bought at Best Buy last year, it was a learning curve!!
Perfect size. Great performance. Wish they packed all the Pro features into this form factor and it would be the best thing going. Best value amongst the iPhones this year.

This phone is great. It’s fast, and has a beautiful screen as well as a great camera. I have not upgraded phones for a long time because I did not like the huge mini tablets that phones have become over the years. But I finally upgraded from my iPhone 6 to this iPhone 12 mini because it was the same size as my old phone. 
  
  The only reason I am not giving this review a full 5 stars is because it lacks a headphone jack and a home button. 
  
  To replace the headphone jack for my car stereo, I had to purchase a dongle for my lightning cable which is a tad bit annoying. It’s annoying but still a valid work around. 
  
  As for the home button, sadly, I haven’t fully gotten used to the new way to navigate easily. It’s a bit awkward to transition from app to app since I have to find the “sweet spot” without accidentally clicking a random button or hyperlink. 
  
  Anyway, all in all, it’s a fast phone, and gets the job done for my needs with a little bit of caveat that I hopefully can learn to deal with as time goes on.
Smaller size works great for me being male and carrying it in pockets. Screen size works just fine.

Love this phone! I upgraded early after having an 11 pro. The 11 pro was too heavy and would hurt my wrist. This phone is small and light! It’s perfect for my small hands. Long time android user here. I had the original droid,but over time I dabbled in apple products. I had been using their ear pods and even got an apple watch, which had limited use with my galaxy s9. I finally made the switch to full apple and are very pleased. I was looking for a phone like the old days, something you didn't need two hands to hold. This phone is perfect. Not only is it beautiful,but powerful. Any issues are dealt with VERY fast by apple through updates. A lot of people have noted battery problems, but coming from the s9, this thing has a great battery. Most of the google apps are still there too and you can still use google maps and gmail. Works flawlessly with the watch and ear pods. Great product!

Really enjoying the smaller size while still getting most of the same features as the larger version. Personally phones just take up to much pocket real estate but this one is the perfect size and weight. Price is not bad either!

I then was able to complete a part of the setup, but needed to call Sprint to get the phone and text service setup. Sprint was Wonderful!! For me, this was an update from an iPhone 6S, so it was a major update, and for me absolutely worth the price. 
  
  I decided to go with the iPhone 12 mini because it fits better in my pocket, and I felt that I didn't really need the additional screen space. I opted for the convenience of carrying a smaller phone. The screen size is actually slightly larger than that of the 6S, while the overall footprint of the phone is slightly smaller. 
  
  The screen is beautiful, with vibrant but not over saturated colors. It seems to have a much wider brightness range than the old phone. I have taken only a few photos so far, but the camera is a substantial upgrade over my old phone. The phone has done everything I have asked of it so far. I was concerned with the face recognition in low light, but it is reliable and quite fast in everything but pure darkness. 
  
  If I had it to do over again, I would certainly buy this phone.
It’s the new iPhone 12, what else can I say? Expect the best of the best. Very clean new design. It’s absolutely brilliant and the best design since the iPhone 4.

Gotta love apple ! Great product as usual!

Anyway he was absolutely no help and just said to wait for email . So I sat at cascade station waiting for an email.

Got the 12 Mini yesterday. My brain said not to spend my money, but my heart said to do it. I came from an 11 Pro. 
  
  Yes, it’s only been a day. But from the moment I got it, I fell in love with it. I love small phones and this fits perfectly in the hand. It’s fast, has an amazing edge to edge display, Face ID, an awesome camera, and has those lovely square edges. I didn’t like them on the bigger phones, but I absolutely love them on the Mini. Not to mention, the black color is gorgeous. It’s an iPhone so there’s not much more for me to really say about it. 
  
  Cons? Well, battery life. It’s not terrible. But it’s noticeably lower than my 11 Pro. To put it in perspective, I took it off the charger at 7am. It’s currently a little after 9 and I’m at 14%. Approx 5 hours of screen on time. My 11 Pro probably would have had roughly 30-40% still if I remember correctly. With that being said, it was at about 69% at around 1:30 (maybe a little less). Not too bad. 
  
  Because of the battery life, I’m giving this phone 4 stars instead of 5. With small phones come compromises. However, I knew I would take a hit with battery life. Fortunately, it’s definitely manageable- I just had to modify my use a bit. 
  
  And as for 5G... well I only have it in some places. It’s cool to see “5G” on the top right of my screen. That’s about it. But it should be relevant in the future. 
  
  All in all, I’ll say, if you can afford it, and are ITCHING for a small phone with flagship specs, go for the 12 Mini. You won’t regret it. If you’re coming from the 11 series, just be prepared for a hit on battery life. But even the battery isn’t too terrible.

Can't turn on the flashlight when phone is off, can't turn it off once it's on without going to the control screen. Slider for answering calls doesn't work, or only works intermittently. Links in browser don't always work. Other strange behaviors. Users on forums are saying it may be a grounding problem, or only does it when using a case, or a screen protector or both. I'm not going to go without either or those, not for the price of this phone, so whatever the issue is I sure hope Apple comes up with a fix soon. Very frustrating! I’m delighted with my iPhone 12 Mini because I wanted a phone that would fit in my shirt pocket. With the smaller notch and lack of a Home button, I have a smaller sized phone with a larger screen — which fits an extra row of icons. The Mini has the same fast processor and OLED screen type as its larger siblings, so it didn’t cut back on capabilities. The one noted cutback is the smaller battery, but I don’t game or stream on my phone, so its shorter battery life has not been an issue for me as I charge less than once a day. Haven’t tested the other improvements, like the supposed stronger glass (I still use a protective case and screen overlay), improved water resistance, 5G, etc.
  It takes a little bit of getting used to the lack of a Home button. Face ID doesn’t work with a mask on, but hopefully that issue will be remedied later this year as the COVID vaccine rolls out.

To deal with the 4 stars 1st, the reasons the A51 I didn't give 5 stars were 1) the length of charging chord is short to the point where you're going to be lucky if you can plug it in and use at the same time if you don't happen to have a chair right next to an outlet and you'll struggle to be able to plug in and have the phone on a bedside table. 2) The second reason is not particularly significant to me, but I do wonder if the battery life may be shorter than a heavy streaming content user would like. Other than those 2 points, I can't fault the phone for an everyday user. There are a lot of you tube vids for this phone that take little digs here and there. For example, the camera is great for 95% of users who are just doing their normal Facebook/Instagram stuff. However, the micro dissection on youtube would make you think it stinks. Those videos are total garbage by idiots who try to impress us with technical knowhow, but probably do no more than take selfies with the cats and stuff like that as does everyone else.

I have been a Samsung Galaxy phone user for many years. I recently upgraded my Note 8 for the A71 5G UW after researching my options. This phone was a great choice (with the two exceptions noted below) for the price. It has a Snapdragon 765G and 8 Gigs of Ram, more than enough power and room to do the daily tasks I ask of a phone. While I thought I would miss the S-pen with the Note 8, I have found that not to be the case. The size is just right for me compared to the Note 8, and the screen seems brighter and clearer than the Note 8 was. The battery is awesome in this phone. With my normal usage, I could probably get two days before needing to charge. Speaking of charging, the super-fast charger can take my phone from 15% to full in about 68 minutes! That's fast. Now to the exceptions: First, this phone does not have wireless charging, and I miss that. I tried a plug-in adapter for the USB-C port that enables the phone to charge wirelessly, but it is hard to get the phone to lie on the charger correctly to enable the phone to actually charge. It's too easy to move the phone enough to make it stop charging. Also, this method is much slower than the charger that came with the phone. Second, this phone has an FM radio built-in, but nothing I have tried to use this feature works. I'm told by Samsung that it is in the phone and also by Verizon, but I'm also told that it must be disabled by Verizon with their software. I can't get any app to actually work with the FM radio (NextRadio being what I used on my old phone). It must be something with the software Verizon uses with the 5G UW variant of the phone. I miss being able to listen to radio when I'm outside - without using data. Overall, I am pleased with the A71 5G UW. It seems to be a well-built phone that is hard to beat when it comes to price.

About a month into ownership, the phone appears to be another solid Samsung product. After familiarizing myself with the newer operating system and figuring out how I wanted to use it, I turned off or controlled data usage for a lot of "unnecessary" background processes and have been easily going 4 to 5 days between battery recharges. (I'll see how battery life holds up over time with software updates) Pro's:
 *The camera is great compared to my old phone. (love the integrated "Scan" feature for documents. )
 *Hands-free voice/audio quality seems very good. 
 *No problems pairing to my cars . . . so far. 
 *Great screen . . . resolution, brightness, outside visibility are all good. 
 * Great overall speed . . . good multi-core processor for how I use a smartphone. (Note : I don't spend hours playing games ... no time for that ... 2 college tuitions to help pay) Cons:
 *There are still limited case choices for the 5G Verizon version. (It has a slightly modified case to accomodate the internal tech)
 *I never had a larger phone like this and suspect it might get a little awkward to carry during the summer with lighter clothing. 
 *This may sound picky, but the "Snooze" button is small on the alarm clock and I haven't bothered to look for an alternate app yet. This is an OS / Application short-coming and shouldn't be considered an A71 issue. Notes: Even though I bought this phone b/c I wanted the 5G capability, I found that I don't have that service at my house and I haven't had a change to test it. I've probably used it during my commute for voice calls, but have never verified / confirmed that. Summary : Very happy!! . . . great product so far. I seemed to get about 98% of the performance and features of a S20/21 for about 40%+/- of the cost.

The phone itself is very nice. I would give it 5 stars if I were reviewing just the phone. Transferring the data from my old phone was easy. Picture quality is exceptional. Battery life is SO much better. (this was the reason for purchasing a new phone). I have no real complaints about the phone other than the constant attempt for me to set up a fingerprint sign in. The problem comes in with the Best Buy service department. Upon receiving my phone, all was well until I noticed a very small nick on my screen, which quickly, developed into a substantial crack. The phone had not been dropped or anything dropped on it. It was in a case with bumpers on the corners for protection since I took it out of the box. I can only suspect there was an unnoticeable crack already there upon receipt. At this point, the phone had been in my possession a week. So, I went online to the chat, explained the situation, was assured by two different representatives that this would be covered by the 14 days repair or return policy of Best Buy. I made an appointment to go into the closest store to me (45 minutes away), only to be treated as a liar (I MUST have done the damage myself) and told they could not replace the phone for me. I explained that I did not want a replacement phone, just wanted the screen either repaired or replaced. I told the manager, if it wasn’t applicable under their policy, I would just pay to have it done. THEN, I was informed that they did not work on Android phones in the store, only iPhones, and was referred to a local repair shop. This would have been nice to know up front, as I told each representative that I chatted with the exact model of my phone. I mentioned this to the manager and told him that Best Buy should make sure that their online representatives should be better educated in their policy details, only to be told, “oh, well, you could have been talking to anyone, anywhere, maybe even in Minnesota.” I fail to see why that would be relevant to the situation. I would assume Best Buy’s policies are the same, no matter where you live. In closing, let me just say that this is the third phone I have purchased from Best Buy. This is the first one I have purchased online and had shipped to me. Prior to this, I have had no problems, so was not involved with the Geek Squad for anything. I was not impressed with their service. Perhaps it was just this particular store. (located at 3750 SW Archer Rd, Gainesville, FL, 32608). I would like to think so. So, this is the reason for only a three stars rating. I am an honest person and did not appreciate the attitude of the people I dealt with.

I wanted to like this phone so bad, but it just has a fatal design flaw: the fingerprint scanner is in the middle of the screen, so any screen protectors or cases that include them make the fingerprint scanner completely unusable. And you *really* need a protector for this screen; just in the couple days it took me to get my case from Amazon, even with no drops or falls and with just normal use, the screen is scuffed up. I'm heartbroken over this, because the camera is so much nicer than my old phone, which is why I got this one. But I need to be able to use the fingerprint scanner, so I guess I have to return it.

Great value, amazing camera, overall a great mid-tier phone for a first time smartphone user.

I read the reviews and decided to buy this phone. I want an easy to use phone that I can text, talk, search the web. Since I don’t play games or watch movies on my phone this Samsung A51 fit my needs and price point at $400 was great. Using it for the past month has been a satisfying experience and I’m not disappointed in my choice.

The phone is great!! The phone is very fast
 at 5g. The phone is the best I've ever owned. 
 Its a lot of phone for the price. I would recommend it to anyone.
The Samsung Galaxy A51 has a great display and is easy to use. Great camera and battery life has been very good.

The A51 Galaxy, is an excellent product for the price. The camera takes very good quality pictures. This phone has all the functions you will need for business or pleasure. FYI, the phone is a little slower on updating then I was expecting, however it is not a deal killer for me.
Its slow, color is very dim and the volume buttons are weird and the speaker is horrible and how to screenshot is also weird

After a few week's use, I am quite happy with my choice of the Galaxy A51 5G phone. Fast, easy to navigate, great reception and battery life. It has all of the features that I need in a cell phone, don't need all the extra bells and whistles. Only one problem, they dumped the bottle cap notification.

Upgraded son's phone from Galaxy VI. He loved that phone but now sees what he's been missing! Great pictures - better than my Note 10. We always choose Samsung Galaxy for their long lasting, quality and reliability.

So far I'm very happy with this phone. I'm glad I found a phone that meets my needs at a price much less than most of the new phones available today. 
 I'm still getting used to some of the features and apps, but generally it's a big improvement over my old LG G2 which served me well for many years. It was definitely time for an upgrade. 
 My only disappointment is the lack of cases currently available. It's been hard to find a case that's compatible with the Verizon version of this phone. Hopefully that will change soon. 
 I was very pleased with the help I received from Jamel in the phone service dept. in the Plymouth Meeting, PA store. He worked with me to activate the new phone and transfer the apps and data from my old phone. It took several calls to Verizon support and probably required more of his time than he expected. He was very patient and courteous and made sure I was completely satisfied with the results before I left the store.
great phone and glad to have a samsumg again. purchased this when my 2nd motorola phone failed. it works great and is easy to carry in my work pocket.
Worst Samsung phone ever bought it had too many issues with display data connection
Great phone and love the picture quality. Not so big a comfortable fit to my hands.
Great phone with great picture quality, runs very smoothly!
Had several issues with phone. Phone roamed everywhere, pic quality wasn't clear, it rung however won't allow me to swipe and answer calls. Had to return it
Great camera, Awesome video, easy to use, so much better than an iphone.
So far so good. Decent upgrade from my Galaxy S9+ Faster and better pics and video. Got great trade in value when released.
The salesperson was excellent in providing me the various options between models. This model met the cost and benefits I was looking for.

Bought this phone for my mother in law. Was a serious upgrade from an ancient Samsung. She loves it! Says its super easy to use, can hear calls clearly, and screen is good and bright. We've been using Samsung phones in our family for years and this was a worthwhile update!

It’s a great phone, quick, intuitively obvious settings. The one thing that is not terrific is the biometrics. It has to scan my fingerprints too many times, and it has to perfectly align with the fingerprint area. My iPhone read my fingerprints if they were crooked, on a daily basis for about five years, so I don’t know why this is so difficult. Nothing like having your phone lock up when you really need it! Other than that one thing, so far, its a great phone.
Good overall very happy biometrics could be better

Bought this phone for my reluctant husband who hates new phones. This one has been great!! And the price at Best Buy was much better than Verizon, and the young man who helped us was quick and informational.
So far so good. Loving it. Sleek, cool looking. Do buy a casing for it as it might be slippery if you have hands like me.

A71 is OK but the sales person at Best Buy indicated that it had wireless charging. IT DOES NOT. My wife wanted the convenience of wireless charging so we had to return it. Did not seem fair to pay re-stocking fees since we were lead to believe it had wireless charging!
very nice phone for the price. has a lot of nice features. easy to download my apps.

I bought this phone as a fairly inexpensive replacement of my S7 that my dog (who has never chewed anything that wasn't his) decided to chew. This phone is easy to use and basically operates the same as my previous S7. It's a little heavier and taller and seems to need a heavier push on the screen.
Service was excellent, and switching phones was easy. Everything worked fine. I really like this phone. Fingerprint entry makes entry quick and easy.
once we got it all straightened out it works great
Good phone. Fun to use. The pictures are very clear.
Replacement for older Samsung. Very good for display. Only complaint I have (a small one) is on the increased size over the last one. I would definitely recommend this phone for purchase.
works great and fast! Love the size and oled picture. Battery is really good!!!

I needed a new smartphone and I did my research on this one. It had great reviews and the young man at Best Buy helped me transfer everything over from my old phone to my new one . Thank you Best Buy !
This is a great phone for the price, I highly recommend!

This is an excellent phone. I'm surprised Verizon and Samsung don't do much more promotion of it. I have one of these personally and a S20 5G FE for work and this would far exceeds the performance of the S20 5G FE. I'm docking a star because the store was not at all helpful. After waiting for 30 minutes, they could not find it in inventory and actually were trying to talk me out of buying the device outright even though they had a promotion tied to it. Won't be going back to that location. Ended up having to buy it online and pick it up at a location across town.
Good, clear screen. Decent camera. Quick processor. Good value

This is my 3rd smartphone, all Samsung. I will never understand why people pay ridiculous price for iPhone. Samsung A71 5G is good as it gets in this price range. Display size is important for me, and this one tops the list at 6.7" I don't care much for wireless charging and water resistance at this time, so I was willing to overlook those.
Phone works great and the battery seems to be holding up for a full day.

Great phone. Feels sturdy and has plenty of memory. Opted for this model over the S20 becuase the A71 keeps a headphone jack and has expandable memory via a micro SD card, both of which were lacking on the S20. 
 Ran into a little glitch when activating because Best Buy provided a SIM card and gave that number to Verizon. The phone came with a pre-installed SIM card so there was a conflict with which numbers to use. 
 The phone is very slippery and cases are nearly impossible to find. The Verizon version of this phone is slightly different from the other 5G versions and case manufacturers have not caught up. The VERY FEW cases on the Verizon site are sold out. So, I'm still shopping and waiting.

Excellent phone. Replaced my old Galaxy S7 after breaking the screen. I didn't need all the bells and whistles (and additional expense of the S20). The A71 is a great phone with all the important upgrades (great cameras and 5G) without having to step completely up to the S20's.
would gave 5 star but since there no sd card slot no deal

wouldnt recommend it. 
 it goes into SAFE MODE by itself. horrible

I have been pleased overall, however, the battery has held as long as I expected. It was an easy adjustment going from a Samsung Galaxy 8. I did prefer the location of the on and off button on the 8s. It made it easier to do screen shots when the 2 buttons were on opposite sides of the phone.
Great phone! Does everything well and is the best phone I have ever owned!

OK level of service, considering that I was a first-time cell phone buyer at Best Buy. Lighting fast, feels great in your hand. I have the 256gb model which I highly recommend which brings us to my only real complaint - you can't add additional storage (memory cards). Please, Samsung don't follow Apples path of proprietary products!
This phone is great & the tech was awesome in store
This is an Amazing phone great photos easy to use and enjoy
I had a good experience with Bet Buy. . Great service, great purchase.

Its super fast, amazing battery and charging. Everybody who I show it to says this phone is really reasonably priced for the features. Though I haven't dropped it, or got it wet, I bought this phone because of its impact and water resistance. I love it, hope it lasts as long as my s5 active did.
Works well, screen is a little sensitive, battery lasts long enough for what I do, kinda miss having a physical home button but then last phone I got was 5 years ago.

Excellent after 1 month but unfortunately today I think something is happening with the screen. A white dot id flickering on the screen all the time. I does not go away. Screen going bad?

Excellent. Great price. Phones shouldn't be expensive

Decent, mid-level Android phone. So far, seems fast and intuitive. Nothing blowing me away as far as features, but I don't feel like I'm lacking anything, either. Favorite feature is the wide-angle lens for the camera.
Purchased to replace an aging phone whose screen had been cracked. The person who received the phone has enjoyed the upgrade.

Love, love this phone. It's easy to use and has a delightful background screen. Would recommend this phone.
excellent product, I liked it except that they did not explain clearly how I got my promotion

After 6 years with my Samsung Galaxy S7 I felt it was time to upgrade. The flagships were out because anything approaching a grand is computer money. I saw some reviews on the A71 and pulled the plug. I’m very happy with my choice. In all respects it fulfills my expectations. Great cameras, nice video (1080p - since I don’t have a 4K TV I’m not missing anything), and decent speed. It connects with my car using Android Auto and hasn’t dropped out so far. It only has one speaker but the volume is generous and the sound is clear. It does take a fraction of a second longer to recognize my fingerprint but that’s hardly a sacrifice. At half the price of the flagships I know I got a great deal, and kept my old plan intact.
Good basic level smartphone that I purchased for my mother.

I didn't realize had bad my old phone had gotten, but I really hate learning a new phone. And what the f is Bixby??? Samsung's personal assistant. I hate it. Had to disable that thing. The employee wasn't very helpful, didn't show me any of the "new" features. He was more interested in chatting with his co-worker. Thanks dude. Not the phone's fault. It works ok. They didn't have a case or protective screen in stock, so I had to order online and wait.....
This phone replaced my Galaxy S7. It is awesome! Couldn't be happier.
Our phone rep was amazing! Smart, funny and very patient with all of our questions. 10-10 would recommend.
Bought this phone for my son and she absolutely loves it. It has so much space and functionality. You would be quite satisfied with a phone like this.

Purchased this phone for my 75yr old father. Got the phone at a good price and easy for him to navigate being his previous phone was an S7 Edge. Very nice phone for the money, fast and wireless charging a plus. Now to see how long it will last...

Nice big screen. Vibrant colors. I like the slim design and lightweight. Good battery life. Good price. Camera will not always produce clear pictures. Talk to text is subpar. Talking into the phone sometimes will not work and words you speak are not texted accurately.

 Probably my favorite feature is the 64 megapixel quad camera system. It takes absolutely stunning pictures and videos. 
 Overall I'm very satisfied with my new Galaxy A71. I don't think any other phones in this price range really match what it brings to the table.

I've been really enjoying my new Galaxy S21+. It is fast and depending on usage, lasts almost 2 days. Best Buy did a great job getting all of my data moved, with a few exceptions. And they walked me thru the entire process, including purchase, change of my AT&T data plan because of the 5G phone.
This is the flagship of Samsung but overall this phone will hold its own with any phone out there and you wont be sorry buying this phone
great value on the phone and associate was more knowledgeable about ATT policies on out right purchasing the phones then the att store
I purchased the Samsung Galaxy A51 5G UW 128 GB Prism Brick Blue (Verizon) from Best Buy for myself. The phone is working very well. I am very happy with it.
it's what I've come to expect from Samsung. I wouldn't buy any other brand.

Michele set up my new phone a few weeks ago, then Taylor worked on my husband's new phone last night. I LOVE THIS PHONE. IT IS VERY EASY TO USE. IT TAKES GREAT PICTURES. I LOVE THE FACT YOU CAN ZOOM IN AND OUT.

She took the time to set up my new phone so that I didn't have to .She was very friendly and took care of everything. My experience was very good .

Most expensive cell phone I have ever purchased, but at the same time best phone purchase overall. It is fast, easier to view and holds a heck of a lot at 128 gigs. Still learning all the great functions!

I waited a super long time to upgrade. The jump from an S7 to this phone is one of the cooler things I've done in a while. Great phone! I bought it for the 5G. But live in a 4G area. It will work in 5G areas that I visit.

The phone, overall, is a pretty good phone. There are a few problems that really stand out. The fingerprint senor is under the glass, and I get "no match" on my fingerprint (have three different fingers in the system) more than 65% of the time, forcing me to use my pin. Unacceptable for a feature. Also, Speech-to-text as well as swype, are horrible on this product. Speech-to-text is just about as unusable as the fingerprint sensor. What was once a "goto" on my Motorola phones, has become unusable on this Samsung phone. The phone it a pretty good phone, but these features, are horribly implemented. I'm not sure I would go with the A51 again because of this.
Great product and this is just what we were looking for.
Very happy with the phone for the price paid on installments

I have loved Samsung products for years and have been waiting for this phone for years, I've been a Galaxy Note fan since the 2nd one, this would have been the perfect phone if you say that if the s pen could have been added, but this is a great phone for technical reasons and for daily use, it's wonderful, its smaller in my pocket than the note 10 plus but when open its like my 8 inch Samsung tablet, so for work its a power house, for play many hours of entertainment, and its tougher than I thought so you don't have to baby it, camera is great as usual from Samsung, I can get a few days of battery on the powerful setting and more with power saving on, speakers are loud, screen looks great, watching TV and videos, and games is like having a small flat screen in your hands, it's a little heavier than my note 10 plus but not an issue it feels great in hand, and I can operate it with one hand without putting it in the mode, I've had it for a moth now I don't have any bad things to say about it, yeah the price is higher but the phone is beautiful and its different, I like different things at times, of your not worried about price I pay $50 a month my note 10 was $46, not bad, I say get it, you will like once its in your hands, maybe after I have it longer I can do another review.
Never thought I would swap back from an iPhone. I had the 11 pro max and I loved it, but this Samsung Fold 2 is very nice. I'm surprised. Keep it up Samsung!
Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G cover is perfect for my phone. It's a sparkly clear cover that allows the lavender color of the phone to show through.

I could tolerate the lack of head phone jack, but not the lack of memory card. I had this phone about 3 hours before I couldn't take it anymore and returned it. I absolutely love it. So much easier to access

The unfortunate reality for this device is the fact that it’s to far ahead of its time. While the device runs brilliantly it is held so far behind by the fact that the majority of third party apps aren’t optimized for it that you can’t help but feel that it’s not worth the money. Snapchat can’t adjust for the funky picture resolution so your friends complain about misformated pictures. Instagram basically runs the size of an iPhone max screen because it’s not optimized. While Samsung cannot control how these other parties run their companies in a sense you’d expect a company the size of Samsung to have more of a say. I ended up decided to return this phone and go back to the wall paintings of Apple that is familiar and optimized.
Love Samsung phones. Quality is A+. Would recommend

This is a really good phone, with amazing battery life and lots of features. However, there is no headphone jack, and it does not come with a wall charger. I don't know why Apple and Samsung have decided to do away with ports and capabilities that are vital to the use of the phone, but not everyone has Bluetooth every where and not everyone has the latest gadgets and gizmos to be able to shift to a totally new way of doing something that is basic functionality so quickly.
